content: Hello! I’m here to help you with your antenatal visit. May I please have your full name, including both first and last name?
Thank you, Gita. Can you please tell me your full address where you currently live?
Flat 302, Sri Venkateshwara Nilaya, near Hanuman Temple, Indiranagar.
Thank you. Could you please provide the complete address, including any missing details like the street name, locality, city, and postal code, so we have your full place of residence?
That's all I know—the full address is Flat 302, Sri Venkateshwara Nilaya, near Hanuman Temple, Indiranagar.  Sorry, I don't remember the postal code.
Thank you for sharing your address. Can you please provide your 10-digit telephone number?
Nine eight three three three four seven two nine zero.
